HERO.BANNER: Frontend Developer Based in Wuppertal Open to work Available for remote work

ABOUT_ME.HEADLINE: About me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hey, I’m Johannes! I really enjoy coding and love experimenting – I’m currently working on my own app. I enjoy trying new things, figuring out solutions, and constantly learning. For me, programming is all about bringing ideas to life.
ABOUT_ME.LOCATION: I’m based in Wuppertal, Germany. I really enjoy working remotely, but I’m also open to opportunities in and around Wuppertal. Flexibility and a good team fit are what matter most to me.
ABOUT_ME.MINDSET: I’m very open-minded and enjoy exploring new technologies. I’m enthusiastic about learning continuously and improving my skills, as I believe staying curious and adaptable is key to delivering great results.
ABOUT_ME.QUALITY: I like to approach problems as if they were puzzles. Combining analytical thinking with a bit of creativity, I explore different ways to solve them, stay persistent until I crack them, and enjoy collaborating with others to find even better solutions. Every challenge is a chance to learn something new and sharpen my skills.

SKILLS.HEADLINE: Skill Set
SKILLS.INTRO: I am a front-end developer experienced with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Angular. I enjoy learning new tools and staying up-to-date with the fast-paced world of web development.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PORTFOLIO.HEADLINE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.DESC: Here you’ll find a selection of my work – interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact me
CONTACT.DESC: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
CONTACT.PLACEHOLDER_MESSAGE: Hello Johannes, I am interested in…
CONTACT.PRIVACY_2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

CONTACT.ERROR_EMAIL_PATTERN: Please enter a valid email address.
